00020 #ifndef FFMPEGINCLUDES_H_
00021 #define FFMPEGINCLUDES_H_
00022 
00023 extern "C"
00024 {
00025 // Hack here to get rid of deprecation compilation warnings
00026 #define attribute_deprecated
00027 
00028 // WARNING: This is GCC specific and is to fix a build issue
00029 // in FFmpeg where UINT64_C is not always defined.  The
00030 // __WORDSIZE value is a GCC constant
00031 #define __STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS 1
00032 #include <stdint.h>
00033 #ifndef UINT64_C
00034 # if __WORDSIZE == 64
00035 #  define UINT64_C(c) c ## UL
00036 # else
00037 #  define UINT64_C(c) c ## ULL
00038 # endif
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 
00042 #include <libavutil/avutil.h>
00043 #include <libavformat/avformat.h>
00044 #include <libavcodec/avcodec.h>
00045 #include <libavdevice/avdevice.h>
00046 #include <libavutil/opt.h>
00047 // FFmpeg changes these form enums to #defines.  change them back.
00048 #undef CODEC_TYPE_UNKNOWN
00049 #undef CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO
00050 #undef CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO
00051 #undef CODEC_TYPE_SUBTITLE
00052 #undef CODEC_TYPE_ATTACHMENT
00053 #undef CODEC_TYPE_NB
00054 
00055 }
00056 #endif /*FFMPEGINCLUDES_H_*/
